pages.title: Overview:
pages.purpose: Introduce the FixOps platform, its purpose as a DevSecOps Decision & Verification Engine, and high-level architecture overview

pages.title: Key Concepts
pages.purpose: Define core terminology: CVE, KEV, EPSS, SARIF, SBOM, VEX, SSVC, Multi-LLM Consensus, and FixOps-specific concepts

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Present the overall system architecture with major components and their interactions, including data flow diagrams

pages.title: Quickstart and Demo
pages.purpose: Guide users through initial setup using setup-wizard.sh and running demo mode

pages.title: Vulnerability Intelligence System
pages.purpose: Document the system for ingesting, processing, and enriching vulnerability data from external feeds

pages.title: KEV and EPSS Feeds
pages.purpose: Explain how CISA KEV catalog and FIRST EPSS scores are fetched, cached, and integrated into the system

pages.title: Threat Intelligence Orchestration
pages.purpose: Document the ThreatIntelligenceOrchestrator and integration with multiple vulnerability feeds (NVD, OSV, GitHub, ExploitDB, ecosystem feeds)

pages.title: Severity Promotion Engine
pages.purpose: Explain how CVE severities are dynamically escalated based on KEV listings and high EPSS scores

pages.title: Exploit Signal Detection
pages.purpose: Detail the ExploitSignalEvaluator and how exploit signals (KEV, EPSS, ExploitDB) are processed

pages.title: Data Ingestion Layer
pages.purpose: Describe the FastAPI application that receives security artifacts and normalizes them for processing

pages.title: FastAPI Application Structure
pages.purpose: Document the create_app factory pattern, router organization, middleware stack, and state management

pages.title: Upload Endpoints
pages.purpose: Detail the /inputs/* endpoints for uploading design, SBOM, SARIF, CVE, VEX, and CNAPP data

pages.title: Chunked Upload System
pages.purpose: Explain the ChunkUploadManager for handling large file uploads with resumability

pages.title: Input Normalization
pages.purpose: Document the InputNormalizer class and parsers for SBOM (CycloneDX, SPDX, Syft), SARIF, CVE feeds, VEX, CNAPP, and business context

pages.title: Crosswalk Correlation Engine
pages.purpose: Explain how design context, SBOM components, SARIF findings, and CVE records are correlated into unified crosswalk entries

pages.title: Decision Engine
pages.purpose: Document the core decision-making system that produces Allow/Review/Block verdicts with confidence scores

pages.title: Multi-LLM Consensus Engine
pages.purpose: Explain how multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Sentinel) are queried and weighted consensus is achieved

pages.title: Decision Policy Engine
pages.purpose: Detail the policy override rules that can block or escalate decisions based on critical vulnerability combinations

pages.title: Risk-Based Profiling
pages.purpose: Explain risk score computation using EPSS, Bayesian priors, Markov projections, and exposure multipliers

pages.title: Enhanced Decision Service
pages.purpose: Document the enhanced decision API endpoints that provide LLM analysis, consensus results, and MITRE TTP mappings

pages.title: Deterministic Fallback Mode
pages.purpose: Explain how the system operates without LLM providers using risk-based heuristics

pages.title: Processing Layer
pages.purpose: Document the advanced analytics engine that applies probabilistic models and graph analysis to vulnerability data

pages.title: Bayesian and Markov Models
pages.purpose: Explain the Bayesian network inference and Markov chain state projection implementations

pages.title: BN-LR Hybrid Risk Model
pages.purpose: Detail the Bayesian Network + Logistic Regression hybrid model for exploitation probability prediction

pages.title: Processing Layer Internals
pages.purpose: Document the ProcessingLayer.evaluate method and integration with 166 vulnerability data sources

pages.title: Knowledge Graph Construction
pages.purpose: Explain how components, vulnerabilities, and dependencies are modeled as a graph using NetworkX

pages.title: Probabilistic Forecasting
pages.purpose: Document the probabilistic forecasting models and confidence metrics for risk predictions

pages.title: Pipeline Orchestration
pages.purpose: Document the PipelineOrchestrator that coordinates all processing stages from input to output

pages.title: Overlay Configuration System
pages.purpose: Explain the fixops.overlay.yml structure, profiles (demo/enterprise), and configuration hierarchies

pages.title: Pipeline Orchestrator
pages.purpose: Detail the PipelineOrchestrator.run method and the sequential processing stages
